channel.title: Log in and die
channel.description: I know there is a permanent fix but everything I try fails....anyone know how to PERMANENTLY fix this glitch? I will rep for help. I have coded alot of nice additions into my server but this glitch kills the fun.Please help me?

I will rep for help. I have coded alot of nice additions into my server but this glitch kills the fun.Please help me?[/quote]
DeltaScape anti-leech.

item.title: Log in and die
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Restart the server, it restarts all the cfg files. It usually means theres a hidden npc, try that.

item.title: Log in and die

item.description:
@mudvayne5493 wrote:

He is talking about in deltascape, the glitch where you login and die and lose all items you have, I help him code and have tried several methods but they only work for maybe a day or 2.
